TopicTitle: Problem with KSOS MODS SPACE CENTER VEHICLES

Articles.Content:
When ever i try to  move  my  KMW COACH or KMW ROVER IN the  mod It dose  not Move.. Like, When I launch KMW COACH or ROVER ,It dose not move no matter how hard i pitch it dose not move... Is It a  bug  Please Help 

MOD I  USED---KSOS: Space Center Vehicles

I actually have the same problem, but this should probably be posted in technical support or in the KSO thread. You'll get more visibility there.

(and welcome to the forum)

5 hours ago, Hrishabh said:

When ever i try to  move  my  KMW COACH or KMW ROVER IN the  mod It dose  not Move.. Like, When I launch KMW COACH or ROVER ,It dose not move no matter how hard i pitch it dose not move... Is It a  bug  Please Help 

MOD I  USED---KSOS: Space Center Vehicles

 

I'm betting you have the wheels on incorrectly. if you zoom in real close and look at the back of the wheels there is an indicator 'nub' near the center of the wheel that needs to be oriented correctly, and its either up or down, but I don't recall which. if its not in the correct position, the wheels have no collider, and just fall through the ground.
Moved to Add-On discussions as this isn't a release thread.
it should be noted that the KSO rovers are set up as ships, not rovers, try using the ship controls to move them.

I also have a problem. when i take any of the parts to launch, the whole game goes black. I can still click buttons, go to buildings, etc. But it as if the whole solar system is just deleted. I am on a mac mini using KSP 1.1.3. If you need any more info about this, let me know.
